Class AV.User

A AV.User object is a local representation of a user persisted to the AV cloud. This class is a subclass of a AV.Object, and retains the same functionality of a AV.Object, but also extends it with various user specific methods, like authentication, signing up, and validation of uniqueness.


Defined in: av.js.

AV.User()
Method Detail
authenticated()
Checks whether this user is the current user and has been authenticated.
Returns:
(Boolean) whether this user is the current user and is logged in.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.become(sessionToken, options)
Logs in a user with a session token. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using current.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} sessionToken
The sessionToken to log in with.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the login completes.
<static> {AV.Object} AV.User.current()
Retrieves the currently logged in AVUser with a valid session, either from memory or localStorage, if necessary.
Returns:
{AV.Object} The currently logged in AV.User.

<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.logIn(username, password, options)
Logs in a user with a username (or email) and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using current.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} username
The username (or email) to log in with.
{String} password
The password to log in with.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the login completes.
See:
AV.User#logIn
{AV.Promise} logIn(options)
Logs in a AV.User. On success, this saves the session to localStorage, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using current.

A username and password must be set before calling logIn.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the login is complete.
See:
AV.User.logIn
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.logInWithMobilePhone(mobilePhone, password, options)
Logs in a user with a mobile phone number and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using current.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} mobilePhone
The user's mobilePhoneNumber
{String} password
The password to log in with.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the login completes.
See:
AV.User#logIn
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.logInWithMobilePhoneSmsCode(mobilePhone, smsCode, options)
Logs in a user with a mobile phone number and sms code sent by AV.User.requestLoginSmsCode.On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using current.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} mobilePhone
The user's mobilePhoneNumber
{String} smsCode
The sms code sent by AV.User.requestLoginSmsCode
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the login completes.
See:
AV.User#logIn
<static> AV.User.logOut()
Logs out the currently logged in user session. This will remove the session from disk, log out of linked services, and future calls to current will return null.
<static> AV.User.requestEmailVerfiy(email, options)
Parameters:
email
options
<static> AV.User.requestEmailVerify(email, options)
Requests a verify email to be sent to the specified email address associated with the user account. This email allows the user to securely verify their email address on the AV site.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} email
The email address associated with the user that doesn't verify their email address.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
<static> AV.User.requestLoginSmsCode(mobilePhone, options)
Requests a logIn sms code to be sent to the specified mobile phone number associated with the user account. This sms code allows the user to login by AV.User.logInWithMobilePhoneSmsCode function.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} mobilePhone
The mobile phone number associated with the user that want to login by AV.User.logInWithMobilePhoneSmsCode
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
<static> AV.User.requestMobilePhoneVerify(mobilePhone, options)
Requests a verify sms code to be sent to the specified mobile phone number associated with the user account. This sms code allows the user to verify their mobile phone number by calling AV.User.verifyMobilePhone

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} mobilePhone
The mobile phone number associated with the user that doesn't verify their mobile phone number.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
<static> AV.User.requestPasswordReset(email, options)
Requests a password reset email to be sent to the specified email address associated with the user account. This email allows the user to securely reset their password on the AV site.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} email
The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
<static> AV.User.requestPasswordResetBySmsCode(mobilePhone, options)
Requests a reset password sms code to be sent to the specified mobile phone number associated with the user account. This sms code allows the user to reset their account's password by calling AV.User.resetPasswordBySmsCode

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} mobilePhone
The mobile phone number associated with the user that doesn't verify their mobile phone number.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.resetPasswordBySmsCode(code, password, options)
Makes a call to reset user's account password by sms code and new password. The sms code is sent by AV.User.requestPasswordResetBySmsCode.
Parameters:
{String} code
The sms code sent by AV.User.Cloud.requestSmsCode
{String} password
The new password.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result of the function.

<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.signUp(username, password, attrs, options)
Signs up a new user with a username (or email) and password. This will create a new AV.User on the server, and also persist the session in localStorage so that you can access the user using #current.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} username
The username (or email) to sign up with.
{String} password
The password to sign up with.
{Object} attrs
Extra fields to set on the new user.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the signup completes.
See:
AV.User#signUp
{AV.Promise} signUp(attrs, options)
Signs up a new user. You should call this instead of save for new AV.Users. This will create a new AV.User on the server, and also persist the session on disk so that you can access the user using current.

A username and password must be set before calling signUp.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{Object} attrs
Extra fields to set on the new user, or null.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the signup finishes.
See:
AV.User.signUp
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.signUpOrlogInWithMobilePhone(mobilePhoneNumber, smsCode, attributes, options)
Sign up or logs in a user with a mobilePhoneNumber and smsCode. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using current.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{String} mobilePhoneNumber
The user's mobilePhoneNumber.
{String} smsCode
The sms code sent by AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode
{Object} attributes
The user's other attributes such as username etc.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled with the user when the login completes.
See:
AV.User#signUpOrlogInWithMobilePhone
AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode
{AV.Promise} signUpOrlogInWithMobilePhone(attrs, options)
Signs up a new user with mobile phone and sms code. You should call this instead of save for new AV.Users. This will create a new AV.User on the server, and also persist the session on disk so that you can access the user using current.

A username and password must be set before calling signUp.

Calls options.success or options.error on completion.

Parameters:
{Object} attrs
Extra fields to set on the new user, or null.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the signup finishes.
See:
AV.User.signUpOrlogInWithMobilePhone
AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode

<static> {AV.Promise} AV.User.verifyMobilePhone(code, options)
Makes a call to verify sms code that sent by AV.User.Cloud.requestSmsCode If verify successfully,the user mobilePhoneVerified attribute will be true.
Parameters:
{String} code
The sms code sent by AV.User.Cloud.requestSmsCode
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result of the function.
